141.heading: Garden Associations.
141.title: "Der Kleingärtner" p. 44-45 in Ein Fest für Rudi
141.author: Peter Puck.
notes: Summary (by M. Harbeck): Rudi tries to become the heir of his rich aunt by caring for her garden while she's in the hospital, but a fascist army of snails has to be beaten first. The "post-war" restoration of the garden costs a fortune but his aunt is happy. She announces that she is going to will everything to a garden association.

142.heading: Garden Centers.
142.title: "Ein Tag im Baumarkt" p. 26 in Ein Fest für Rudi
142.author: Peter Puck.
notes: Summary (by M. Harbeck): A parody on the growing home-improvement markets and garden centers and the always more exciting presentation of new products.

A reprint with code "W.D.-C'n'D #9".
